snippet.title: Earthbound Dimensions - Mother Direct 2022 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The Earthbound Dimensions trailer presented at the 2022 Mother Direct.

Earthbound Dimensions is a fangame made with Godot Engine that reimagines Earthbound/Mother 2 as a 3D game.

Currently the visuals might be a bit rough around the edges in the trailer, but all assets, including models, animations, sounds, music and code were created from scratch by me, representing my tiny indie studio named Studio Allele, and have been in development for around 2 years. Slowly but surely!

I hope you enjoy the trailer and look forward to the demo, coming somewhere around the end of 2022, if everything goes according to plan!

-- Relevant links to learn more about the project and the studio --
Project website: https://ebdimensions.com
Project profile on twitter: https://twitter.com/earthbound3d
My profile on twitter: https://twitter.com/antourenein
My profile on bandcamp: https://antourenein.bandcamp.com/ (You can check the Earthbound Dimensions Soundtrack over there)
